note.p: Education: ?St Catherine's College, Cambridge; BA (1702); Inner Temple (admitted 1692)
References: Historical Register Chronological Diary 1719, p10 (obituary)

Notes: There is a John Sherlock in AC. Note in AB states 'Received Mr Sherlock's contributions to 28 Feb 1718/1719 to near time of his death, bond delivered to Dr Harwood who discharged it.' Entry made 16 Apr 1719.
